thread.title: Texas police say man was driving drunk in stolen golf cart
thread.title_full: Texas police say man was driving drunk in stolen golf cart

author: 13abc
title: Texas police say man was driving drunk in stolen golf cart
text:
COLLEGE STATION, Texas (KBTX) - College Station police say a man was arrested after he was caught driving drunk in a stolen golf cart near the campus.
Seth Allen Dillard, 29, was taken into custody around 2:00 a.m. Monday.
Police say they first spotted Dillard and two other people in the golf cart near Boyett Street and Louise Avenue.
According to a Probable Cause Statement obtained by KBTX, police say Dillard was driving in a reckless manner on the street.
Dillard told police he took the golf cart from a parking lot on the Texas A&M campus by the post office.
Police say Dillard admitted to being at Northgate before taking the golf cart, but denied drinking alcohol.
"The defendant stated multiple times that he had only had a lot of water that night to drink" according to the statement.
